reviews.snippet: 本格的なトルコ料理が手軽に楽しめてとても楽しかったです！

extracted_snippet.original: 本格的なトルコ料理が手軽に楽しめてとても楽しかったです！
extracted_snippet.translated: It was so much fun to be able to enjoy authentic Turkish cuisine so easily!

response.snippet:
アキラ様、温かいレビューをありがとうございます！
本格的なトルコ料理を気軽に楽しんでいただけたこと、そして静かで心地よい雰囲気の中でお過ごしいただけたことを大変嬉しく思います。
またのご来店をスタッフ一同、心よりお待ちしております！

よろしくお願いいたします。
ボスボラス・ハサン チームより

We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Thank you.
From the Bosphorus Hasan Team

response.snippet:
Dear Santiago,
Thank you for your comment.
We open at 11:00 AM as stated on our business hours because we need time in the morning to prepare everything fresh for our customers.
We hope to welcome you again after 11!
Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
Bosphorus Hasan Team

reviews.snippet:
初トルコ料理でした🇹🇷
クセもなく、苦手と感じるものはなく美味しかったです。
パンが凄く美味しかった！ナンとはまた違う感じがフムスと合いました。
トルコピザが美味しい😋
最後に温かい紅茶のサービスも❤️
次は色々食べてみたいです。

extracted_snippet.original:
初トルコ料理でした🇹🇷
クセもなく、苦手と感じるものはなく美味しかったです。
パンが凄く美味しかった！ナンとはまた違う感じがフムスと合いました。

最後に温かい紅茶のサービスも❤️

extracted_snippet.translated:
It was my first time eating Turkish food 🇹🇷
It was delicious, with no peculiar taste and nothing I didn't like.
The bread was really good! It had a different flavor from naan and went well with the hummus.
The Turkish pizza was delicious 😋
They also served hot tea at the end ❤️
Next time I'd like to try a variety of different foods.

details.group_size: 2 people, 5-8 people, Suitable for all group sizes

reviews.snippet:
新宿御苑近くのトルコ料理店「ボスボラス ハサン（Bosphorus Hasan）」へ🇹🇷

新宿御苑前駅から徒歩3分ほどの場所にある、異国情緒あふれるお店！
店内はトルコの装飾が施され、まるで現地にいるかのような雰囲気。

お目当ての「イスケンデル・ケバブ」は、ドネルケバブにトマトソースとヨーグルトソースがかかった一品。旨みたっぷりで、量も十分あり、かなりお腹いっぱいになりました☺️

そして驚いたのが、トルコの蒸留酒「ラク」も飲めること🍸
料理との相性も抜群。地中海料理とラクのペアリング、なかなか味わえない体験ができます◎

スタッフの方々も親切で、初めてのトルコ料理でも安心して楽しめました。新宿で本格的なトルコ料理を味わいたい方は、ぜひ訪れてみてください🎶

extracted_snippet.original:

新宿御苑前駅から徒歩3分ほどの場所にある、異国情緒あふれるお店！
店内はトルコの装飾が施され、まるで現地にいるかのような雰囲気。

スタッフの方々も親切で、初めてのトルコ料理でも安心して楽しめました。新宿で本格的なトルコ料理を味わいたい方は、ぜひ訪れてみてください🎶
extracted_snippet.translated:
We went to a Turkish restaurant called Bosphorus Hasan near Shinjuku Gyoen 🇹🇷

A restaurant with an exotic atmosphere, located about a 3-minute walk from Shinjuku Gyoenmae Station!

The interior of the restaurant is decorated with Turkish decorations, making it feel like you are in Turkey.

The Iskender Kebab we were looking for is a dish of doner kebab topped with tomato sauce and yogurt sauce. It was full of flavor and the quantity was enough, so we were quite full ☺️

And what surprised us was that we could also drink the Turkish distilled alcohol "raki" 🍸
It goes great with the food. The pairing of Mediterranean cuisine with raki is a rare experience◎

The staff were also kind, so we were able to enjoy Turkish food with peace of mind even though it was our first time. If you want to taste authentic Turkish food in Shinjuku, please visit us🎶

reviews.snippet: Gercekten cok guzeldi yemeklet fiyatina deger

extracted_snippet.original: Gercekten cok guzeldi yemeklet fiyatina deger
extracted_snippet.translated: It was really delicious, worth the price of the meal.

reviews.snippet:
We visited Bosphorus Hasan for the first time today! I had tried Turkish food before, and I wanted to have Turkish food in Tokyo. We ordered the Adana and Iskender, and both were great. The adana plate was flavorful and spicy, and the iskender had plenty of sauce. The ekmek (bread) was soft and fluffy, and really hot (straight from the oven). The staff are really nice, and even offered to charge my phone—I didn’t even need to ask.
I’ll try to come back the next time I’m in Tokyo!

extracted_snippet.original:
We visited Bosphorus Hasan for the first time today! I had tried Turkish food before, and I wanted to have Turkish food in Tokyo. We ordered the Adana and Iskender, and both were great. The adana plate was flavorful and spicy, and the iskender had plenty of sauce. The ekmek (bread) was soft and fluffy, and really hot (straight from the oven). The staff are really nice, and even offered to charge my phone—I didn’t even need to ask.
I’ll try to come back the next time I’m in Tokyo!

You can also order from the dinner menu at lunchtime and they will serve you flexibly.
The restaurant is clean and the bread is delicious.
They also have baklava for dessert, which is great.

reviews.snippet: Ce restaurant doit avoir un peu de professionnalisme et respecter ses clients. Les horaires d'ouverture et de fermeture ne sont pas respectés, on ne tient pas compte que des gens font une heure pour se déplacer jusqu'au restaurant dans une ville comme Tokyo. Honteux

extracted_snippet.original: Ce restaurant doit avoir un peu de professionnalisme et respecter ses clients. Les horaires d'ouverture et de fermeture ne sont pas respectés, on ne tient pas compte que des gens font une heure pour se déplacer jusqu'au restaurant dans une ville comme Tokyo. Honteux
extracted_snippet.translated: This restaurant needs to have some professionalism and respect its customers. Opening and closing times are not respected, and they don't take into account that people travel an hour to get to a restaurant in a city like Tokyo. Shameful.

response.snippet:
Bonjour,
Merci pour votre message. Nous sommes désolés si vous avez rencontré un désagrément.
À titre d’information, notre restaurant est fermé uniquement le lundi. Le dimanche, nous sommes bien ouverts, mais il arrive que le döner kebab soit épuisé plus tôt que prévu, selon la demande du jour.
Dans ce genre de situation, nous vous conseillons de nous appeler avant de venir, afin que nous puissions vous informer en temps réel.
En tant que responsable du restaurant, je peux personnellement vérifier ce qu’il s’est passé si vous me précisez le jour et l’heure de votre passage.
Merci pour votre compréhension et au plaisir de vous accueillir dans de meilleures conditions.

extracted_snippet.original:
Bonjour,
Merci pour votre message. Nous sommes désolés si vous avez rencontré un désagrément.
À titre d’information, notre restaurant est fermé uniquement le lundi. Le dimanche, nous sommes bien ouverts, mais il arrive que le döner kebab soit épuisé plus tôt que prévu, selon la demande du jour.
Dans ce genre de situation, nous vous conseillons de nous appeler avant de venir, afin que nous puissions vous informer en temps réel.
En tant que responsable du restaurant, je peux personnellement vérifier ce qu’il s’est passé si vous me précisez le jour et l’heure de votre passage.
Merci pour votre compréhension et au plaisir de vous accueillir dans de meilleures conditions.
extracted_snippet.translated:
Hello,
Thank you for your message. We apologize for any inconvenience.
For your information, our restaurant is closed only on Mondays. We are open on Sundays, but sometimes the doner kebab sells out earlier than expected, depending on the demand for the day.
In this type of situation, we recommend calling us before coming so that we can keep you informed in real time.
As the restaurant manager, I can personally verify what happened if you let me know the day and time of your visit.
Thank you for your understanding and we look forward to welcoming you back in the best possible conditions.

response.snippet:
Dear Seamus, thank you for visiting our restaurant and taking the time to leave a review.
We’re truly sorry to see that you were not satisfied, but since no details were provided, we’re unsure what went wrong.
If you could kindly share more about your experience, we would be very grateful and eager to improve.
We look forward to hearing from you.
